dark_mode_description: Toggle dark mode on or off
enter_file_description: Enter a description for the file
error_fetch_files: An error occurred while fetching uploaded decks.
error_unexpected_fetch_decks: An unexpected error occurred while fetching decks.
error_unexpected_saving_deck: An unexpected error occurred while saving the deck.
error_deleting_deck: An error occurred while deleting the deck.
get_started_create_deck: Get started by creating your first deck.
no_flashcard_decks: You don't have any flashcard decks yet. Create a new deck to begin your learning journey!
flashcards_tooltip: Need Flashcards? Chat can help you produce study-ready flashcards in seconds. Sample Request: "Generate 10 flashcards to help me with my math exam preparation."
deck_has_no_flashcards: This deck doesn't have any flashcards yet.
completed_flashcards: You've completed all the flashcards in this deck.
error_generic: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again later.
confirm_delete_description: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation? This action cannot be undone.
welcome_title: Welcome to Your AI-Powered Learning Assistant
welcome_subtitle: Enhance your learning experience with personalized flashcards and intelligent chat support
purpose_feature_1_description: Easily generate and manage custom flashcard decks for any subject
purpose_feature_2_description: Get instant answers and explanations from our AI-powered chat assistant
purpose_feature_3_description: Monitor your learning journey with detailed progress tracking and analytics
example_prompts_title: Example Prompts to Get You Started
example_prompt_1: Create a flashcard deck about the solar system
example_prompt_3: What are the key events of World War II?
news_item_1_description: Optimize your learning with our new spaced repetition algorithm
news_item_2_description: Take your learning on the go with our new mobile app
news_item_3_description: Join our weekly learning challenges and compete with others
